titleStmt.title: A catechisme briefly opening the misterie of our redemption by Christ hauing the proues of euery point so annexed, and ioined vnder euery answer, that the ruder sort of people may be much furthered thereby, if they would vse a little diligence and endeuor to commit it to memory, or be much conuersant in reading thereof, or if they cannot read in hearing it read by others, vnto knowledge, and godlinesse.
titleStmt.author: Settle, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. How, for Henry Car, and are to be sold at the Blasing Starre in Paules Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
